summary: Project includes an Admin Login with security settings needing an updated strong password, special-character input support, and case-sensitive authentication to unlock the Admin Dashboard.
architectural_notes: Admin Login authentication must be case-sensitive and accept special characters in the password input without errors.
known_issues: Hardcoding or storing the admin password in plaintext is a security risk; prefer secure hashing/secret storage even if the password value is specified.

existing_features.title: Update the Client Admin login to use the new strong password exactly as provided: "@ni#ra&j*gurja:r" (replacing the current simple password).
Ensure Client Admin password authentication remains strictly case-sensitive so that uppercase/lowercase letters must match exactly to unlock the admin panel/dashboard.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update Admin Login password to '@ni#ra&j*gurja:r' and ensure case-sensitive validation; allow special characters (@, #, &, *, :) so correct entry unlocks Admin Dashboard
Ensure the Client Admin login password input accepts special characters (including @, #, &, *, and :) and submits them unchanged for authentication comparison.

projectName: Update client admin login password and ensure special-character, case-sensitive validation
